title: New LoTR Not Racist Enough? Trump’s Nazi Graceland 09.09.22
itunes:title: New LoTR Not Racist Enough? Trump’s Nazi Graceland 09.09.22
description:
In episode 1327 Jack and Miles are joined by writer, producer, and co-host of Yo, Is This Racist? Andrew Ti, to discuss… UPS Workers Are Ready To Strike, So Is The Media…, Everything We Know About Trump’s Presidential Library (Which Somehow Involves Vanilla Ice), Lord of the Rings Has Always Had Shitty Fans and more!

  1. The Trump Presidential Library Is Online — And It’s Not What You’d Think
  2. George W. Bush library dedication: Exhibits include 9/11, war, Katrina
  3. At Bush Library, A Chance To Be The Decider-In-Chief
  4. Trump’s unusually lawyerly response to allegations of destroying documents
  5. Inside Trump’s war on the National Archives
  6. Trump Is Fantasizing About a $2 Billion Presidential Library and Museum in Florida: WaPo
  7. Staten Island pitched as location for Trump’s presidential library
  8. Trump Keeps History at Bay by Putting Off Presidential Library
  9. Staring down the trolls: What's really behind the battle over The Rings Of Power?
  10. Dear Tolkien Fans: Black People Exist
  11. Was Tolkien really racist?
  12. The 46 Seconds When Non-White Actors Speak In 'Lord Of The Rings'
  13. In Middle Earth, Must All Hobbits Be White?

LISTEN: She's Gone by Bob Marley

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
